testcase.classname: Feature to test Jiva design Merchandising T and A Data Entry screen functionality
testcase.name: To Test the Filter Functionality
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And Click on the Woven Module...............................................passed Then click on the Merchandising Module......................................passed And Click on the T and A Module.............................................passed And Click on the Merchandising T&A Data Entry Screen........................passed And Click on the Styles Expansion...........................................passed And Click on the Filter Icon................................................passed And Search The IPO and Style................................................passed And Click on the Apply button...............................................passed And Select the IPO and Style................................................passed And Click on the Add button.................................................passed Given Enter the data in proto commends received field.......................passed Given Enter the data in Fit submittion and Approval fields..................passed And Enter the data in Fit Remarks Field.....................................passed And Verify whether the Fabric Initial In House date is prepopulated in the field or not.passed And Click on the Fabric Initial In House Date View button...................passed And Click on the Fabric Initial In House Date View Close button.............passed And Click on the PP Add button..............................................passed And Enter the data in PP Submission and Approval............................passed
